meanings.definition: To bring to an end or completion.
meanings.sent1: She finishes her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always finishes his meal quickly.
meanings.sent3: The race finishes with a surprise winner.
meanings.sent4: The story finishes with a twist.
meanings.sent5: The sun finishes its journey across the sky.

meanings.definition: The final part or last stage of something.
meanings.sent1: The cake's finishes were beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent2: The finishes of the play left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The finishes of the movie were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The finishes of the puzzle fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The finishes of the race determined the winner.

meanings.definition: The texture or appearance of a surface after treatment or work has been completed.
meanings.sent1: The wood finishes were smooth and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The finishes of the painting added depth to the colors.
meanings.sent3: The finishes of the car made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The finishes of the fabric were soft to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The finishes of the building gave it a modern look.
